This is an exception in your code, not in SWT.  Am I missing something?

(In reply to comment #1)
> This is an exception in your code, not in SWT.  Am I missing something?
> 
The error occurred whilst I edited a file (DoorsLink/test/model/ModuleTest.java) in eclipse/JDT and Eclipse's error log has many of these errors.
This is a problem in org.moreunit.ui.MarkerUpdateRunnable, which tries to grab the workspace lock in an asyncExec (should run this in a Job).

(In reply to comment #4)
> This is a problem in org.moreunit.ui.MarkerUpdateRunnable, which tries to grab
> the workspace lock in an asyncExec (should run this in a Job).
> 

oops, thats embarrassing (I helped write moreunit). Sorry.
